DOC.brief_summary: This study aims to determine the incidence of intussusceptions (IS) (including suspected cases of intussusception) after vaccination with Oral Rotarix® under clinical practice, in Japan.
DOC.brief_title: Special Drug Use Investigation for ROTARIX®
DOC.detailed_description: This is non-interventional study conducted in one group received Oral Rotarix®.
DOC.criteria: Infants who receive Rotarix for the first time to prevent rotavirus gastroenteritis, an indication of Rotarix, will be included in the investigation. All infants included in the drug use investigation of Oral Rotarix will be excluded.
